H0.text: How many valves does a trumpet have. 1

H1.text: How many valves does a trumpet have. 2

H2.text: How many valves does a trumpet have. 4

H3.text: How many valves does a trumpet have. 3

A4.text: Modern trumpets have three (or, infrequently, four) piston valves

A5.text: Early trumpets did not provide means to change the length of tubing, whereas modern instruments generally have three (or sometimes four) valves in order to change their pitch.
